about_the_game:
Pay 2 Win is an idle game about world domination. Join your two new assistants, Annie and May as they assist you in employing the most devious tactics the games industry has to offer. Go from humble beginnings with pay for convenience sales tricks, to artificially scarce battle passes and more!

As your repute grows, so do your choices; will you take the difficult path of soulful game design, or the path of least resistance and succumb to the dark powers  bequeathed to you by your finance board? Each decision made alters your run and affects the story. One thing is certain - to make it in this industry, you'll need wits, a bit of luck, and resources. Lots and lots of resources.
